FuncDef: The reset ptp-adaptive statistics command clears the statistics about 1588 ACR/ATR.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset ptp-adaptive statistics command is used to clear 1588 ACR/ATR statistics.
Configuration Impact
After the reset ptp-adaptive statistics command is used, statistics about 1588 ACR/ATR packets are cleared.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
